CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"
version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="no"/>
<xsl:template match="*"> <xsl:copy> <!-- <xsl:apply-templates select="document('cdrutil:/docid')" mode="copy"/>--> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="refidx">
<refidx><xsl:apply-templates/></refidx> </xsl:template>
<!-- ================================================================= Template rule used to do XML to XML transformations which copies any attribute node, or node that is child of of something ==================================================================-->
<xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="copy"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*" mode="copy"/> <xsl:apply-templates mode="copy"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
